description: Show the full details of a job production plan inspectable summary.
permissions: Available for users authorized by the JobProductionPlanInspectableSummaryPolicy scope: job production plans must be in approved or complete status, and access is granted to admins, or to non-admins when the plan is within their JobProductionPlan policy scope, when they are a manager member of the plan developer organization, or when they are an inspector on the plan and a member of that developer organization.
validation_notes: The job production plan ID argument is required and cannot be blank.
